name: Foolproof Poached Eggs
author: RACH7H
summary: Delicious, foolproof poached eggs. The vinegar will help the egg whites set more easily.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch dried dill, or to taste
directions: Fill a large saucepan with 2 to 3 inches of water and bring to a simmer
Reduce the heat to medium-low, pour in vinegar, and keep the water at a gentle simmer
Crack an egg into a small cup
Place cup near the surface of the hot water and gently drop egg into the water
Turn off heat, cover, and let sit until whites are set, 4 minutes
Lift eggs out of pan with a slotted spoon
Season with salt, pepper, and dill
